verses.name: Numbers 13:19
verses.text: And what the land is that they dwell in, whether it be good or bad; and what cities they be that they dwell in, whether in tents, or in strong holds;

verses.name: Numbers 13:20
verses.text: And what the land is, whether it be fat or lean, whether there be wood therein, or not. And be ye of good courage, and bring of the fruit of the land. Now the time was the time of the firstripe grapes.

verses.name: Numbers 13:21
verses.text: So they went up, and searched the land from the wilderness of Zin unto Rehob, as men come to Hamath.
